00036 void sopt_wavelet_convd(double *out_l, double *out_h, double *in, 
00037                    double *h0, double *h1, int length_sig, int length_filt)
00038 {
00039         int i,j;
00040         
00041         for(i=0; i<length_sig; i++)
00042         {
00043                 *(out_l+i) = 0; *(out_h+i) = 0;
00044                 for(j=0; j<length_filt; j++)
00045                 {
00046                         if(length_sig<=(i+j))
00047                         {
00048                                 *(out_l+i) += *(in+i+j-length_sig) * *(h0+length_filt-j-1);
00049                                 *(out_h+i) += *(in+i+j-length_sig) * *(h1+length_filt-j-1);
00050                         }
00051                         else
00052                         {
00053                                 *(out_l+i) += *(in+i+j) * *(h0+length_filt-j-1);
00054                                 *(out_h+i) += *(in+i+j) * *(h1+length_filt-j-1);
00055                         }
00056                 }
00057         }       
00058 }
00059 
00072 void sopt_wavelet_convu(double *out, double *in_l, double *in_h, 
00073                                 double *h0, double *h1, int length_sig, int length_filt)
00074 {
00075         int i,j;
00076         
00077         for(i=0; i<length_sig; i++)
00078         {
00079                 *(out+(i+length_filt-1)%length_sig) = 0;
00080                 for(j=0; j<length_filt; j++)
00081                 {
00082                         if(length_sig<=(i+j))
00083                         {
00084                                 *(out+(i+length_filt-1)%length_sig) += *(in_l+i+j-length_sig) * *(h0+length_filt-j-1) + 
00085                                         *(in_h+i+j-length_sig) * *(h1+length_filt-j-1);
00086                         }       
00087                         else
00088                         {
00089                                 *(out+(i+length_filt-1)%length_sig) += *(in_l+i+j) * *(h0+length_filt-j-1) + 
00090                                         *(in_h+i+j) * *(h1+length_filt-j-1);
00091                         }
00092                                 
00093                 }
00094         }       
00095 }

00107 void sopt_wavelet_gdfwtr(double *w, double *x, sopt_wavelet_param param_wav) 
00108 {
00109         double *h0, *h1;
00110         double *in, *out_l, *out_h;
00111         int i, j, decomp_level, dim_max;
00112         
00113     if (param_wav.type == SOPT_WAVELET_Dirac){
00114 
00115         i = param_wav.nx1*param_wav.nx2;
00116                 cblas_dcopy(i, x, 1, w, 1);
00117 
00118     }
00119     else{
00120 
00121         /* Allocate memory */
00122                 dim_max = max(param_wav.nx1, param_wav.nx2);
00123                 in= (double *) malloc(dim_max * sizeof(double));
00124                 SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(in);
00125                 out_l= (double *) malloc(dim_max * sizeof(double));
00126                 SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(out_l);
00127                 out_h= (double *) malloc(dim_max * sizeof(double));
00128                 SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(out_h);
00129                 h0 = (double *) malloc(param_wav.h_size * sizeof(double));
00130                 SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(h0);
00131                 h1 = (double *) malloc(param_wav.h_size * sizeof(double));
00132                 SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(h1);
00133         
00134                 /* Lowpass and highpass analysis (decomposition) filters */
00135                 for (i=0; i<param_wav.h_size; i++)
00136                 {
00137                         *(h0+i) = *(param_wav.h+param_wav.h_size-i-1);
00138                         *(h1+i) = *(param_wav.h+i);
00139                 }
00140                 for (i=0; i<param_wav.h_size; i+=2)
00141                         *(h1+i) = -*(h1+i);
00142         
00143                 /* Main loop */
00144                 for (decomp_level = 0; decomp_level<param_wav.nb_levels; decomp_level++ )
00145                 {
00146                         /* Transform along rows */
00147                         for (i=0; i<param_wav.nx1/pow(2, decomp_level); i++){
00148                                 /* Copy input */
00149                                 if(decomp_level==0){
00150                                         for(j=0; j<param_wav.nx2/pow(2, decomp_level); j++)
00151                                         *(in+j) = *(x+i+param_wav.nx1*j);
00152                                 }
00153                                 else{
00154                                         for(j=0; j<param_wav.nx2/pow(2, decomp_level); j++)
00155                                         *(in+j) = *(w+i+param_wav.nx1*j);
00156                                 }
00157                         
00158                                 /* Perform filtering lowpass and highpass */ 
00159                                 sopt_wavelet_convd(out_l, out_h, in, h0, h1, param_wav.nx2/pow(2, decomp_level), param_wav.h_size);
00160                                 /* Downsample and copy output */ 
00161                                 for(j=0; j<param_wav.nx2/pow(2, decomp_level+1); j++)
00162                                 {
00163                                         *(w+i+param_wav.nx1*j) = *(out_l+2*j);
00164                                 }
00165                                 for(j=param_wav.nx2/pow(2, decomp_level+1); j<param_wav.nx2/pow(2, decomp_level); j++)
00166                                 {
00167                                         dim_max = param_wav.nx2/pow(2, decomp_level+1);
00168                                         *(w+i+param_wav.nx1*j) = *(out_h+2*(j-dim_max));
00169                                 }
00170                         }
00171                 
00172                         /* Transform along columns*/
00173                         for (j=0; j<param_wav.nx2/pow(2, decomp_level); j++){
00174                                 /* Copy input */
00175                                 for(i=0; i<param_wav.nx1/pow(2, decomp_level); i++)
00176                                 *(in+i) = *(w+i+param_wav.nx1*j);
00177 
00178                                 /* Perform filtering lowpass and highpass */ 
00179                                 sopt_wavelet_convd(out_l, out_h, in, h0, h1, param_wav.nx1/pow(2, decomp_level), param_wav.h_size);
00180                                 /* Downsample and copy output */ 
00181                                 for(i=0; i<param_wav.nx1/pow(2, decomp_level+1); i++)
00182                                 {
00183                                         *(w+i+param_wav.nx1*j) = *(out_l+2*i);
00184                                 }
00185                                 for(i=param_wav.nx1/pow(2, decomp_level+1); i<param_wav.nx1/pow(2, decomp_level); i++)
00186                                 {
00187                                         dim_max = param_wav.nx1/pow(2, decomp_level+1);
00188                                         *(w+i+param_wav.nx1*j) = *(out_h+2*(i-dim_max));
00189                                 }
00190 
00191                         }
00192                 }
00193         
00194                 /* Free memory */
00195                 free(in); free(out_h); free(out_l);
00196                 free(h0); free(h1);
00197     }
00198 }
00199 
00208 void sopt_wavelet_gdiwtr(double *x, double *w, sopt_wavelet_param param_wav) 
00209 {
00210         double *h0, *h1;
00211         double *in_l, *in_h, *out;
00212         int i, j, decomp_level, dim_max;
00213 
00214         if (param_wav.type == SOPT_WAVELET_Dirac){
00215 
00216                 i = param_wav.nx1*param_wav.nx2;
00217                 cblas_dcopy(i, w, 1, x, 1);
00218 
00219     }
00220     else{
00221 
00222         /* Allocate memory */
00223                 dim_max = max(param_wav.nx1, param_wav.nx2);
00224                 in_l= (double *) malloc(dim_max * sizeof(double));
00225                 SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(in_l);
00226                 in_h= (double *) malloc(dim_max * sizeof(double));
00227                 SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(in_h);
00228                 out= (double *) malloc(dim_max * sizeof(double));
00229                 SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(out);
00230                 h0 = (double *) malloc(param_wav.h_size * sizeof(double));
00231                 SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(h0);
00232                 h1 = (double *) malloc(param_wav.h_size * sizeof(double));
00233                 SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(h1);
00234         
00235                 /* Lowpass and highpass synthesis (reconstruction) filters */
00236                 for (i=0; i<param_wav.h_size; i++)
00237                 {
00238                         *(h0+i) = *(param_wav.h+i);
00239                         *(h1+i) = *(param_wav.h+param_wav.h_size-i-1);
00240                 }
00241                 for (i=1; i<param_wav.h_size; i+=2)
00242                         *(h1+i) = -*(h1+i);
00243         
00244                 /* Initialization - Copy all data in the output vector */
00245                 cblas_dcopy(param_wav.nx1*param_wav.nx2, w, 1, x, 1);
00246         
00247                 /* Main loop */
00248                 for (decomp_level = param_wav.nb_levels; decomp_level>0; decomp_level--)
00249                 {
00250                         /* Transform along rows */
00251                         for (i=0; i<param_wav.nx1/pow(2, decomp_level-1); i++){
00252 
00253                                 /* Copy inputs and upsample*/
00254                                 /* low frequency part */
00255                                 for (j=0; j<param_wav.nx2/pow(2, decomp_level); j++){
00256 
00257                                         *(in_l+2*j) = *(x+i+param_wav.nx1*j);
00258                                         if((2*j+1)<param_wav.nx2)
00259                                                 *(in_l+2*j+1) = 0.0;
00260                                 }
00261                                 /* High frequency part */
00262                                 dim_max = param_wav.nx2/pow(2, decomp_level);
00263                                 for(j=param_wav.nx2/pow(2, decomp_level); j<param_wav.nx2/pow(2, decomp_level-1); j++){
00264                                         *(in_h+2*(j-dim_max)) = *(x+i+param_wav.nx1*j);
00265                                         if((2*(j-dim_max)+1)<param_wav.nx2)
00266                                                 *(in_h+2*(j-dim_max)+1) = 0.0;
00267                                 }
00268                                 /* Perform filtering lowpass and highpass */
00269                                 sopt_wavelet_convu(out, in_l, in_h, h0, h1, param_wav.nx2/pow(2, decomp_level-1), param_wav.h_size);
00270                                 /* Copy output */
00271                                 for(j=0; j<param_wav.nx2/pow(2, decomp_level-1); j++)
00272                                         *(x+i+param_wav.nx1*j) = *(out+j);
00273                         }
00274 
00275                         /* Transform along columns */
00276                         for (j=0; j<param_wav.nx2/pow(2, decomp_level-1); j++){
00277 
00278                                 /* Copy inputs and upsample */
00279                                 /* Low frequency part */
00280                                 for(i=0; i<param_wav.nx1/pow(2, decomp_level); i++)
00281                                 {
00282                                         *(in_l+2*i) = *(x+i+param_wav.nx1*j);
00283                                         if((2*i+1)<param_wav.nx1)
00284                                                 *(in_l+2*i+1) = 0.0;
00285                                 }
00286                                 /* High frequency part */
00287                                 dim_max = param_wav.nx1/pow(2, decomp_level);
00288                                 for(i=param_wav.nx1/pow(2, decomp_level); i<param_wav.nx1/pow(2, decomp_level-1); i++)
00289                                 {
00290                                         *(in_h+2*(i-dim_max)) = *(x+i+param_wav.nx1*j);
00291                                         if((2*(i-dim_max)+1)<param_wav.nx1)
00292                                                 *(in_h+2*(i-dim_max)+1) = 0.0;
00293                                 }
00294                                 /* Perform filtering lowpass and highpass */
00295                                 sopt_wavelet_convu(out, in_l, in_h, h0, h1, param_wav.nx1/pow(2, decomp_level-1), param_wav.h_size);
00296                                 /* Copy output */
00297                                 for(i=0; i<param_wav.nx1/pow(2, decomp_level-1); i++)
00298                                         *(x+i+param_wav.nx1*j) = *(out+i);
00299 
00300                         }
00301                 }
00302         
00303                 /* Free memory */
00304                 free(in_l); free(in_h); free(out);
00305                 free(h0); free(h1);
00306         
00307     }
00308 }

00310 
00320 void sopt_wavelet_gdfwtc(complex double *w, complex double *x, sopt_wavelet_param param_wav) 
00321 {
00322         double *temp_in, *temp_wr, *temp_wi;
00323         int i;
00324 
00325         if (param_wav.type == SOPT_WAVELET_Dirac){
00326 
00327                 i = param_wav.nx1*param_wav.nx2;
00328                 cblas_zcopy(i, (void*)x, 1, (void*)w, 1);
00329 
00330     }
00331     else{
00332         /* Allocate memory */
00333                 temp_in = (double *) malloc(param_wav.nx1*param_wav.nx2 * sizeof(double));
00334                 SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(temp_in);
00335                 temp_wr = (double *) malloc(param_wav.nx1*param_wav.nx2 * sizeof(double));
00336                 SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(temp_wr);
00337                 temp_wi = (double *) malloc(param_wav.nx1*param_wav.nx2 * sizeof(double));
00338                 SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(temp_wi);
00339         
00340                 /* Copy real part and do wavelet decomposition */
00341                 for (i=0; i < param_wav.nx1*param_wav.nx2; i++){
00342                         *(temp_in+i) = creal(*(x+i));
00343                 }
00344                 sopt_wavelet_gdfwtr(temp_wr, temp_in, param_wav);
00345         
00346                 /* Copy imaginary part and do wavelet decomposition */
00347                 for (i=0; i < param_wav.nx1*param_wav.nx2; i++){
00348                         *(temp_in+i) = cimag(*(x+i));
00349                 }
00350                 sopt_wavelet_gdfwtr(temp_wi, temp_in, param_wav);
00351 
00352                 for (i=0; i < param_wav.nx1*param_wav.nx2; i++){
00353                         *(w+i) = *(temp_wr+i) + I*(*(temp_wi+i));
00354                 }
00355         
00356                 /* Free memory */
00357                 free(temp_wr);
00358                 free(temp_wi);
00359                 free(temp_in);  
00360     }
00361 }
00362 
00363 
00373 void sopt_wavelet_gdiwtc(complex double *x, complex double *w, sopt_wavelet_param param_wav) 
00374 {
00375         double *temp_in, *temp_wr, *temp_wi;
00376         int i;
00377 
00378         if (param_wav.type == SOPT_WAVELET_Dirac){
00379 
00380         i = param_wav.nx1*param_wav.nx2;
00381                 cblas_zcopy(i, (void*)w, 1, (void*)x, 1);
00382 
00383     }
00384     else{
00385         /* Allocate memory */
00386                 temp_in = (double *) malloc(param_wav.nx1*param_wav.nx2 * sizeof(double));
00387                 SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(temp_in);
00388                 temp_wr = (double *) malloc(param_wav.nx1*param_wav.nx2 * sizeof(double));
00389                 SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(temp_wr);
00390                 temp_wi = (double *) malloc(param_wav.nx1*param_wav.nx2 * sizeof(double));
00391                 SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(temp_wi);
00392         
00393                 /* Copy real part and do inverse wavelet transform */
00394                 for (i=0; i < param_wav.nx1*param_wav.nx2; i++){
00395                         *(temp_in+i) = creal(*(w+i));
00396                 }
00397                 sopt_wavelet_gdiwtr(temp_wr, temp_in, param_wav);
00398         
00399                 /* Copy imaginary part and do inverse wavelet transform */
00400                 for (i=0; i < param_wav.nx1*param_wav.nx2; i++){
00401                         *(temp_in+i) = cimag(*(w+i));
00402                 }
00403                 sopt_wavelet_gdiwtr(temp_wi, temp_in, param_wav);
00404 
00405                 for (i=0; i < param_wav.nx1*param_wav.nx2; i++){
00406                         *(x+i) = *(temp_wr+i) + I*(*(temp_wi+i));
00407                 }
00408         
00409                 /* Free memory */
00410                 free(temp_wr);
00411                 free(temp_wi);
00412                 free(temp_in);  
00413     }
00414         
00415         
00416 }

00427       
00428     
00429     double hfilt1[2] = {0.707106781186548, 0.707106781186548};
00430     double hfilt2[4] = {0.482962913144690, 0.836516303737469, 0.224143868041857, -0.129409522550921};

00438     double hfilt10[20] = {0.026670057900951, 0.188176800077621, 0.527201188930920, 0.688459039452592, 0.281172343660426, -0.249846424326489, -0.195946274376597, 0.127369340335743, 0.093057364603807, -0.071394147165861, -0.029457536821946, 0.033212674058933, 0.003606553566988, -0.010733175482980, 0.001395351746994, 0.001992405294991, -0.000685856695005, -0.000116466854994, 0.000093588670001, -0.000013264203002};

00441 
00442     switch (param->type){
00443 
00444         case SOPT_WAVELET_Dirac:
00445              param->h_size = 1;
00446              param->h = (double*)malloc(param->h_size * sizeof(double));
00447              SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(param->h);
00448              param->h[0] = 1.0;
00449              break;
00450         case SOPT_WAVELET_DB1:

00459              SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(param->h);
00460              cblas_dcopy(param->h_size, hfilt2, 1, param->h, 1);
00461              break;
00462         case SOPT_WAVELET_DB3:

00467              break;

00471              SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(param->h);

00473              break;

00478              cblas_dcopy(param->h_size, hfilt5, 1, param->h, 1);
00479              break;
00480         case SOPT_WAVELET_DB6:
00481              param->h_size = 12;
00482              param->h = (double*)malloc(param->h_size * sizeof(double));
00483              SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(param->h);
00484              cblas_dcopy(param->h_size, hfilt6, 1, param->h, 1);
00485              break;
00486         case SOPT_WAVELET_DB7:

00493              param->h_size = 16;
00494              param->h = (double*)malloc(param->h_size * sizeof(double));
00495              SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(param->h);
00496              cblas_dcopy(param->h_size, hfilt8, 1, param->h, 1);
00497              break;
00498         case SOPT_WAVELET_DB9:
00499              param->h_size = 18;
00500              param->h = (double*)malloc(param->h_size * sizeof(double));
00501              SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(param->h);
00502              cblas_dcopy(param->h_size, hfilt9, 1, param->h, 1);
00503              break;
00504         case SOPT_WAVELET_DB10:
00505              param->h_size = 20;
00506              param->h = (double*)malloc(param->h_size * sizeof(double));
00507              SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(param->h);
00508              cblas_dcopy(param->h_size, hfilt10, 1, param->h, 1);
00509              break;
00510
